Title: 1. One Hundred and One Dalmatians
Description: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella De Vil, the owners must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

Title: 2. West Side Story
Description: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

Title: 3. Seong Chun-hyang
Description: Chun-hyang, the only daughter of an old gisaeng named Wolmae, falls in love with Lee Mong-nyong and promises to marry him. But Lee leaves for Seoul with his father who's an aristocrat, and the new governor, Byeon Hakdo, covets Chun-hyang because she is the most beautiful girl in town. When Chun-hyang rejects his order to serve him at night, Governor Byeon sends her to jail. In the mean time, Lee passes the state exam and becomes a special undercover agent of the king. He comes back to where Chun-hyang lives to save her and punishes Governor Byeon.

Title: 4. Last Year at Marienbad
Description: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.

Title: 5. A Woman Is a Woman
Description: A stripper who's desperate to become a mother accepts her reluctant boyfriend's suggestion that she be impregnated by his best friend.

Title: 6. Lola
Description: A bored young man meets with his former girlfriend, now a cabaret dancer and single mother, and soon finds himself falling back in love with her.

Title: 7. Léon Morin, Priest
Description: Set during occupied France, a faithless woman finds herself falling in love with a young priest.

Title: 8. A Difficult Life
Description: Silvio refuses to fight for the fascists and joins the resistance with Elena. After the war, his vitriolic newspaper articles cause him to be sentenced to imprisonment.

Title: 9. Yojimbo
Description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

Title: 10. La Notte
Description: A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their steadily deteriorating relationship.

Title: 11. The Exiles
Description: Follows a family of Native Americans living in the City of Angels.

Title: 12. Il posto
Description: Bursting with big dreams and plans, an Italian teen goes to Milan to work in a big impersonal corporate office, where he becomes disillusioned and drained of all his individualism.

Title: 13. Judgment at Nuremberg
Description: Fictionalized depiction of the 1947 Judges' Trial, the third of twelve trials of Nazi war criminals conducted by the American occupying forces in Nuremberg, Germany, in which former judges of Nazi Germany were tried for their actions.

Title: 14. Breakfast at Tiffany's
Description: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

Title: 15. The Curse of the Werewolf
Description: In eighteenth-century Spain, an adopted boy becomes a werewolf and terrorizes the inhabitants of his town.

Title: 16. The Parent Trap
Description: Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

Title: 17. The Guns of Navarone
Description: A team of Allied saboteurs is assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held Greek island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.

Title: 18. The Hustler
Description: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

Title: 19. The Innocents
Description: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

Title: 20. The Misfits
Description: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically-independent lifestyle.

Title: 21. One-Eyed Jacks
Description: After they rob a bank in Mexico, Dad Longworth absconds with the loot leaving his partner, Rio, to be captured by the Rurales. 5 years later, Rio escapes from prison and seeks revenge on Longworth, but falls in love with his step-daughter.

Title: 22. Splendor in the Grass
Description: The love of high school sweethearts Deanie and Bud is weighed down by the oppressive expectations of their parents and society in smalltown Kansas in 1928, threatening the future of their relationship.

Title: 23. El Cid
Description: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz de Vivar (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

Title: 24. The Children's Hour
Description: A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of lesbianism.

Title: 25. A Raisin in the Sun
Description: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.

Title: 26. Blue Hawaii
Description: After arriving back in Hawaii from the Army, Chad Gates defies his parents' wishes for him to work at the family business and instead goes to work as a tour guide at his girlfriend's agency.

Title: 27. Pocketful of Miracles
Description: New York bootlegger Dave the Dude and his girlfriend Elizabeth "Queenie" Martin try to turn boozy street beggar Apple Annie into a society lady when Annie learns that her daughter Louise is marrying the son of a Spanish count.

Title: 28. Mysterious Island
Description: During the Civil War a group of Union soldiers, a Confederate and a civilian escape the stockade using a hot-air balloon and end up on a strange Pacific island.

Title: 29. Viridiana
Description: Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior.

Title: 30. Night Tide
Description: A young sailor is attracted to a mysterious mermaid performing at a carnival, but soon suspects that the girl is actually a siren who draws men to their watery deaths during the full moon.

Title: 31. One, Two, Three
Description: In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.

Title: 32. The Pit and the Pendulum
Description: In the sixteenth century, Francis Barnard travels to Spain to clarify the strange circumstances of his sister's death after she had married the son of a cruel Spanish Inquisitor.

Title: 33. King of Kings
Description: The temporary physical life of the Biblical Savior, Jesus Christ.

Title: 34. Through a Glass Darkly
Description: Recently released from a mental hospital, Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family in their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.

Title: 35. The Comancheros
Description: Texas Ranger Jake Cutter arrests gambler Paul Regret, but soon finds himself teamed with his prisoner in an undercover effort to defeat a band of renegade arms merchants and thieves dealing with the Comanches known as Comancheros.

Title: 36. Babes in Toyland
Description: Mary Contrary is set to marry Tom Piper when he is kidnapped by Roderigo and Gonzorgo, two goons working for the evil Barnaby who wants to marry Mary for her inheritance.

Title: 37. Paris Blues
Description: During the 1960s, two American expatriate jazz musicians living in Paris meet and fall in love with two American tourist girls.

Title: 38. The Absent Minded Professor
Description: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

Title: 39. Flower Drum Song
Description: A young woman arrives in San Francisco's Chinatown from Hong Kong with the intention of marrying a rakish nightclub owner, unaware he is involved with one of his singers.

Title: 40. Accattone
Description: A pimp with no other means to provide for himself finds his life spiraling out of control when his prostitute is sent to prison.

Title: 41. Mothra
Description: An expedition to Infant Island uncovers a native tribe and twin tiny fairy priestesses of a mythical deity, who sets out to rescue the pair after they are kidnapped by a greedy businessman.

Title: 42. Divorce Italian Style
Description: A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.

Title: 43. Barabbas
Description: Governor Pontius Pilate gave the populace a choice to spare either Barabbas, a criminal, or Jesus, condemned as a heretic, from crucifixion. The masses chose Barrabas, and he is haunted by the image of Jesus for the rest of his life.

Title: 44. Victim
Description: A closeted lawyer risks his career to bring a blackmailer to justice.

Title: 45. Murder She Said
Description: When Miss Jane Marple reports witnessing a murder through the window of a passing train, the police dismiss her as a dotty spinster when no trace of the crime can be found.

Title: 46. Two Rode Together
Description: A corrupt marshal is pressured by his army friend into negotiating the release of white captives of the Comanches, but finds that their reintegration into society has its consequences.

Title: 47. The Last Sunset
Description: At a Mexican ranch, fugitive O'Malley and pursuing Sheriff Stribling agree to help rancher Breckenridge drive his herd into Texas where Stribling could legally arrest O'Malley, but Breckenridge's wife complicates things.

Title: 48. Flight That Disappeared
Description: A cross-country airliner, whose passengers include a nuclear physicist, a rocket expert, and a mathematical genius, is drawn beyond radar range by an unknown, unbreakable force.

Title: 49. Whistle Down the Wind
Description: When an injured wife murderer takes refuge on a remote Lancashire farm, the owner's three children mistakenly believe him to be the Second Coming of Christ.

Title: 50. Lover Come Back
Description: A series of misunderstandings leaves an advertising executive with a campaign for a product which has not yet been invented, while he romances his rival in the guise of its inventor.

Title: 51. Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
Description: When the Earth is threatened by a burning Van Allen Radiation Belt, U.S. Navy Admiral Harriman Nelson plans to shoot a nuclear missile at the Belt, using his experimental atomic submarine, the Seaview.

Title: 52. Scream of Fear
Description: A wheelchair-bound young woman returns to her father's estate after 10 years, and although she's told he's away, she keeps seeing his dead body on the estate.

Title: 53. The Colossus of Rhodes
Description: While holidaying in Rhodes, an Athenian war hero becomes involved in two plots to overthrow the tyrannical king: one from Rhodian patriots, and the other from sinister Phoenician agents.

Title: 54. A Question of Suspense
Description: A bent business man bumps off a colleague who threatens to expose him for forging bonds.

Title: 55. Girl with a Suitcase
Description: A girl pursues a guy who fooled her, but fascinates his younger brother instead.

Title: 56. Mr. Sardonicus
Description: A mysterious and cruel Baron, whose face has become frozen in a horrifying grin, demands that a prominent London physician apply experimental treatments on him to restore his face.

Title: 57. The 7th Commandment
Description: A car wreck gives Pete amnesia. He becomes an evangelist with a preacher's help. His new success leads his ex and her boyfriend to blackmail him over missing money. As his memory returns, Pete believes that he killed the other driver.

Title: 58. The Human Condition III: A Soldier's Prayer
Description: His ideals challenged by life as a conscript in war-time Japan's military, a pacifist faces ever greater tests in his fight for survival.

Title: 59. The Devil at 4 O'Clock
Description: A crusty, eccentric priest recruits three reluctant convicts to help him rescue a children's leper colony from a Pacific island menaced by a smoldering volcano.

Title: 60. The Deadly Companions
Description: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory.

Title: 61. The Roman Spring of Mrs. Stone
Description: An aging actress travels to Rome with her husband; after he suddenly dies during the flight, she begins a passionate affair with a young gigolo.

Title: 62. The Snake Woman
Description: While investigating unusual snakebite deaths in a rural village, a Victorian Scotland Yarder charms a cold-bloodied beauty.

Title: 63. A Taste of Honey
Description: A pregnant teenage girl must fend for herself when her mother remarries, leaving the girl with only a new male friend for support.

Title: 64. The Ladies Man
Description: A clueless, recently-single graduate unwittingly takes a job as a servant in a mansion inhabited by dozens of young women.

Title: 65. Reptilicus
Description: After copper miners discover a piece of the frozen tail of a giant prehistoric reptile in Lapland, scientists inadvertently bring it back to life.

Title: 66. Naked As Nature Intended
Description: Three girls on a tour of the English countryside meet up with two young women who introduce them to the joys of life in a nudist camp.

Title: 67. Hercules in the Haunted World
Description: Hercules must journey into Hades itself to retrieve the magic stone that will free his love from the powers of darkness.

Title: 68. Fanny
Description: Young Marius dreams of leaving his dull provincial life and seeing the world. When the beautiful Fanny declares her adoration for him, Marius must choose between an adventurous life at sea and the grandest adventure of all: love.

Title: 69. Homicidal
Description: The brutal stabbing murder of a justice-of-the-peace sparks an investigation of dark family secrets in a sleepy small town in Southern California.

Title: 70. Atlantis: The Lost Continent
Description: Welcome to Atlantis, where royal guardsmen wear uniforms that could easily be from the wardrobe of Ming the Merciless and some unfortunate slaves are turned into bovine-headed beasts.

Title: 71. Tintin and the Mystery of the Golden Fleece
Description: Tintin and Captain Haddock try to discover what is so desirable about their old and apparently worthless ship.

Title: 72. Something Wild
Description: A young rape victim tries desperately to pick up the pieces of her life, only to find herself at the mercy of a would-be rescuer.

Title: 73. Cash on Demand
Description: A charming but ruthless criminal holds the family of a bank manager hostage as part of a cold-blooded plan to steal 97,000 pounds.

Title: 74. Greyfriars Bobby: The True Story of a Dog
Description: The remarkable veritable story of a terrier named Bobby and the enduring friendship he forges with a tenderhearted shepherd known simply as Old Jock---unbroken even by the kindly old man's death.

Title: 75. The Day the Earth Caught Fire
Description: When the U.S. and Russia unwittingly test atomic bombs at the same time, it alters the nutation (axis of rotation) of the Earth.

Title: 76. Gorgo
Description: Greedy sailors capture a giant lizard off the coast of Ireland and sell it to a London circus, inciting the wrath of the creature's much-larger mother.

Title: 77. The Young Savages
Description: A district attorney investigates three white teenagers accused of murdering a blind Puerto Rican kid.

Title: 78. The Phantom Planet
Description: After an invisible asteroid draws an astronaut and his ship to its surface, he is miniaturized by the phantom planet's exotic atmosphere.

Title: 79. A Thunder of Drums
Description: The trials and tribulations of bitter veteran Captain Maddocks and argumentative rookie Lieutenant McQuade at a cavalry desert outpost.

Title: 80. Come September
Description: Younger generation vs. "older" folks on vacation at an Italian villa.

Title: 81. Spare the Rod
Description: It is London in the year 1960 and John Saunders enthusiastically begins his new teaching career at a tough slum-area school. His class are bored pupils in their last term before leaving. Will he handle the grave problems that lie ahead?

Title: 82. Mother Joan of the Angels
Description: A priest is sent to a small parish in the Polish countryside which is believed to be under demonic possession and there he finds his own temptations awaiting.

Title: 83. Nude on the Moon
Description: A rich rocket scientist organizes an expedition to the moon, which they discover is inhabited by nude women.

Title: 84. Gidget Goes Hawaiian
Description: Gidget, on vacation in Hawaii, finds a gang of lads vying for her attention, starting a chain of romantic complications when her boyfriend arrives.

Title: 85. Blast of Silence
Description: A hired killer from Cleveland has a job to do on a second-string mob boss in New York, but a special girl from his past and a gun dealer with pet rats get in his way.

Title: 86. X-15
Description: During the Cold War in the 1960s the U.S.A.F. and NASA tested the experimental rocket-powered aircraft X-15 that set altitude and speed records and reached the edge of outer space.

Title: 87. Town Without Pity
Description: Four American soldiers stationed near a German village face death in the rape of a local girl, and are defended by outside counsel Major Steve Garrett.

Title: 88. The Steamroller and the Violin
Description: Seven-year-old Sasha practices violin every day to satisfy the ambition of his parents. Already withdrawn as a result of his routines, Sasha quickly regains confidence when he accidentally meets and befriends worker Sergei, who works on a steamroller in their upscale Moscow neighborhood.

Title: 89. Havoc in Heaven
Description: Sun Wukong, the King of the Monkeys, sets off on his first adventure to gain a worthy weapon. This earns the attention of the Jade Emperor of Heaven.

Title: 90. The Naked Edge
Description: Five years after George Radcliffe was the chief witness in a high profile murder case, his wife receives a blackmailing letter accusing him of the crime.

Title: 91. Gold of the Seven Saints
Description: In Seven Saints, Utah, McCracken's outlaw gang is vying for fur trappers Jim Rainbolt and Shaun Garrett's gold nugget fortune that also catches the eye of Mexican bandit Gondora and his caballeros.

Title: 92. Wild in the Country
Description: A troubled young man discovers that he has a knack for writing when a counselor encourages him to pursue a literary career.

Title: 93. By Love Possessed
Description: Neurotic woman engages in an affair with the law partner of her impotent husband.

Title: 94. Black Gravel
Description: A West German trucker who illegally sells black gravel reunites with a former lover, now married to an American.

Title: 95. Goodbye Again
Description: A successful business woman, dissatisfied with her current, philandering lover, starts an affair with a much younger man.

Title: 96. The Beast of Yucca Flats
Description: A defecting Soviet scientist is hit by a nuclear explosion near Yucca Flats and roams around as a beast.

Title: 97. The Second Time Around
Description: In 1911, a widow with two children leaves New York City for territorial Arizona and becomes a ranch hand and later gets herself elected sheriff. A gambler and a rancher become rivals for her affections.

Title: 98. Carry on Regardless
Description: The Helping Hands agency employs some very strange people to perform some very strange jobs. Even the simplest of tasks get bungled by the incompetent but lovable staff.

Title: 99. The Outsider
Description: Tony Curtis plays an Indian (Nicknamed "Chief" by other soldiers) who fights in WWII and helps to raise the flag at Iwo Jima.

Title: 100. Mad Dog Coll
Description: Story of Vincent "Mad Dog" Coll, a notorious gangland killer in the 1930s.
